response.overview: Maggie is an alluring free spirit who won't let anyone – or anything – tie her down. But she meets her match in Jamie, whose relentless and nearly infallible charm serves him well with the ladies and the cutthroat world of pharmaceutical sales. Maggie and Jamie's evolving relationship takes them both by surprise, as they find themselves under the influence of the ultimate drug: love.
response.tagline: Addicted to one-night stands or dependent on one another?
response.title: Love & Other Drugs

titles.title: O Amor é o Melhor Remédio

results.name: Love and Other Drugs | Trailer HD | 20th Century FOX
